Instead, I teach the animals to perform on stage by allowing them to show off their individual personalities and talents, Gregory Popovich said. The World Famous Gregory Popovich Comedy Pet Theater has been written up in People magazine, lauded by The New York Times and seen on David Letterman and Jay Leno . - Sirius XM shock jock Howard Stern ripped into Jay Leno , accusing him of stealing material for`` The Tonight Show,'' in an interview scheduled to air Tuesday night, the New York Post reported Monday. Jay Leno is insane. And Jay Leno is a crook. And the world knows exactly what he's up to.
